page.title: 08WOMENS INSTITUTE
page.content: We are part of the National Federation of Womens Institutes.Annual conference held in London.At County level we send delegates twice per year.Our Nicholforest W.I. has a membership of 40.We meet on the second Wednesday of each month in the Public Hall.Commence meeting with W.I.song"Jerusalem",President reads the monthly County Newsletter,a speaker or demonstrator addresses us for an hour,supper prepared and served by members on a rota basis,a raffle to help funds and to end,members arrange a social half hour.We also make visits to places of interest and other W.I's and have social functions here and away.A Committee of 12 arrange functions and generally administer all our affairs.The annual subscription is four pounds.
